query: UPDATE mg_discount_rule SET name = COALESCE(?1, name), receipt_name = COALESCE(?2, receipt_name), product_scope = COALESCE(?3, product_scope), target_id = COALESCE(?4, target_id), adjustment_type = COALESCE(?5, adjustment_type), adjustment_value = COALESCE(?6, adjustment_value), is_active = COALESCE(?7, is_active), updated_at = ?8 WHERE id = ?9
